Cavebliss..."},{"lineNumber":171680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　門番にまであんな扱いとは","translatedEnglishLine":"to treat even the gatekeeper like that."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黄泉平坂って迷宮があるんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a labyrinth called Yomiheisaka...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴はそこから生まれたって言われてる奴だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's said to have been born from there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一代限りのレアモンスター、つったかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think they called him a once-in-a-lifetime rare monster...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その強さをおとーたまが気に入って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father liked his strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時期、毛利家の食客さんだったのよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and for a time, he was a retainer of the Mouri family?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知り合いならどくように言え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you know him, tell him to step aside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄な戦いは疲れるだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Useless fights just wear you out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんね、ランスたま、それ無理なの☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, Lord Rance, that's impossible ☆

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか無駄、かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, pointless, I guess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「親しい、それが我が刃を納める理由にはならんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being close doesn’t give me reason to sheathe my blade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とでも言うであろうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s probably what he would say...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう意味だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you mean by that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴は、修羅の國から産まれし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is born from the land of Asura,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死を纏う人骨の王」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the king of skeletal bones who wears death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「常にその身が本能的に死を欲する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His body instinctively craves death at all times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「親しい間柄であればあるほど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The closer the relationship,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その相手を発作的に殺したいと願う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the more he impulsively wishes to kill that person,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう因果な業を持ってるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the tragic fate he carries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初は歓迎しておった我が毛利も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our Mouri family initially welcomed him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後には元就の手によって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but in the end, under Motonari's hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放逐せざるを得なかったほどにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were forced to exile him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、ケイブリスに使われるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, to be used by Cavebliss...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様はもっと誇り高きもののふだと思っていたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you were a much prouder warrior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、なんとか言ったらどうだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, say something, will you!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……語るべき言葉は持たん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I have no words to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死に呑まれよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Be swallowed by death!
Gah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っていた両者が一時離れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two who were fighting temporarily separate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （確かにこいつは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Indeed, this guy is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり厄介な強さだぞ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: quite a troublesome strength...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「小癪な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How irritating...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、それ故に愉快」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But because of that, it's enjoyable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 骸骨王モドカタは武器を納めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Skeleton King, Modokata, sheathed his weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の身でそれほどの勇猛、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such bravery for a mere human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派の者が協力するのも頷ける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can understand why those from the Hornet faction would cooperate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「通れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pass through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我は彼奴に愚妻を人質に取られたが故、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am here only because he has taken my foolish wife hostage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 此処にいるのみの弱者よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making me the only weak one here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人質……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A hostage...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでケイブリスなぞに従っていたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that's why you were obedient to Cavebliss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てか、嫁さんいたのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, you have a wife...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元より義理立てする筋合いはなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had no reason to owe him anything from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ故、悪鬼成敗せしめんとす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: therefore, I intend to have the demon punished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主らを止める権利を我は持たん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no right to stop you all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……さりとて、かの暴虐の化身が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That said, I doubt that embodiment of cruelty will kneel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膝をつくとも思えぬが、な」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but who knows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 骸骨王モドカタが壁に寄り道を空けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Skeleton King Modokata made a path by the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早く進め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さもなくば――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さもなくば、なんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise, what?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、主らを殺してしまうかも知れん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, I might just kill you all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はモドカタの横を通り、奥へと向かう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others passed by Modokata and headed deeper inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかつい見た目の割に気さくな奴だったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was quite friendly despite his rough appearance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや〜……昔はあそこまでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah... he wasn’t like that back in the day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫁さんの影響かね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it’s because of his wife...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、ケイブリス……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, Cavebliss...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門番にまであんな扱いとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to treat even the gatekeeper like that.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黄泉平坂って迷宮があるんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a labyrinth called Yomiheisaka...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴はそこから生まれたって言われてる奴だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's said to have been born from there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一代限りのレアモンスター、つったかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think they called him a once-in-a-lifetime rare monster...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その強さをおとーたまが気に入って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My father liked his strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時期、毛利家の食客さんだったのよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and for a time, he was a retainer of the Mouri family?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知り合いならどくように言え。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you know him, tell him to step aside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄な戦いは疲れるだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Useless fights just wear you out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんね、ランスたま、それ無理なの☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, Lord Rance, that's impossible ☆

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか無駄、かな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, pointless, I guess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「親しい、それが我が刃を納める理由にはならんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being close doesn’t give me reason to sheathe my blade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とでも言うであろうな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s probably what he would say...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう意味だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you mean by that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴は、修羅の國から産まれし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is born from the land of Asura,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死を纏う人骨の王」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the king of skeletal bones who wears death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「常にその身が本能的に死を欲する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His body instinctively craves death at all times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「親しい間柄であればあるほど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The closer the relationship,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その相手を発作的に殺したいと願う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the more he impulsively wishes to kill that person,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう因果な業を持ってるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the tragic fate he carries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初は歓迎しておった我が毛利も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our Mouri family initially welcomed him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後には元就の手によって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but in the end, under Motonari's hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 放逐せざるを得なかったほどにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were forced to exile him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、ケイブリスに使われるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, to be used by Cavebliss...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様はもっと誇り高きもののふだと思っていたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you were a much prouder warrior.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、なんとか言ったらどうだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, say something, will you!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……語るべき言葉は持たん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I have no words to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死に呑まれよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Be swallowed by death!
Gah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っていた両者が一時離れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two who were fighting temporarily separate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （確かにこいつは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Indeed, this guy is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり厄介な強さだぞ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: quite a troublesome strength...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「小癪な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How irritating...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、それ故に愉快」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But because of that, it's enjoyable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 骸骨王モドカタは武器を納めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Skeleton King, Modokata, sheathed his weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の身でそれほどの勇猛、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such bravery for a mere human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派の者が協力するのも頷ける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can understand why those from the Hornet faction would cooperate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「通れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pass through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我は彼奴に愚妻を人質に取られたが故、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am here only because he has taken my foolish wife hostage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 此処にいるのみの弱者よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making me the only weak one here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人質……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A hostage...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでケイブリスなぞに従っていたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that's why you were obedient to Cavebliss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てか、嫁さんいたのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, you have a wife...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元より義理立てする筋合いはなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had no reason to owe him anything from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ故、悪鬼成敗せしめんとす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: therefore, I intend to have the demon punished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主らを止める権利を我は持たん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no right to stop you all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……さりとて、かの暴虐の化身が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That said, I doubt that embodiment of cruelty will kneel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膝をつくとも思えぬが、な」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but who knows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 骸骨王モドカタが壁に寄り道を空けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Skeleton King Modokata made a path by the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早く進め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さもなくば――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さもなくば、なんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise, what?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、主らを殺してしまうかも知れん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh, I might just kill you all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はモドカタの横を通り、奥へと向かう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others passed by Modokata and headed deeper inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかつい見た目の割に気さくな奴だったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was quite friendly despite his rough appearance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや〜……昔はあそこまでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah... he wasn’t like that back in the day...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫁さんの影響かね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it’s because of his wife...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、ケイブリス……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, Cavebliss...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門番にまであんな扱いとは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to treat even the gatekeeper like that.
